A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
After a second viewing\, most if not all of my "concerns" with The Last Jedi have already faded into oblivion. This is a fantastic Star Wars film and one of my favorite films from 2017. There is so much packed into this 152 minutes it doesn't at all feel long. 

What I love about Star Wars is that most of the time an episode leaves us with some answers and even more questions. This movie does that expertly. My hat is off to Rian Johnson\, John Williams and of course this expert cast. 

Will wait until viewing 3 to post a more lengthy review\, but just wanted my opinion out there!
